segments.text: Good afternoon , sir . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like a beef-burger , a French fries and a milk shake , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What flavor would you prefer , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not quite sure . What do you have ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have strawberry , chocolate , vanilla and banana .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very well , I'll try the banana flavor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , thanks . That will be all .
segments.speaker: S2
